data.text: @IvoryHecker @Miah98403263 A stopped following NewsMax when they took the position that the election was not stolen.

@IvoryHecker @davidglenbailey Suppression of truth is lying. In some cases, it is worse than lying, as the listener cannot even weigh evidence on both sides of a question. Why people are going to alternate media.
@IvoryHecker Knew something was funky at Newsmax. Followed for a while and steadily became suspicious
@IvoryHecker Are you seriously pretending that Newsmax and Fox didn't criticize the vaccines and say COVID was no big deal?

@IvoryHecker It says “purchased advertising”… I’ve seen conservative shows with lib-leaning ads… and that’s “so what”. Did they take the money and change their reporting? That is the real question, and I cannot tell from the quote…maybe they all did! I want clarification
@IvoryHecker @TariRiddle Taxpayer dollars used to trick us with #MSM @DNC @CDCgov narrative

@screenscholar @Elk_Chaser_406 @IvoryHecker The original tweet is so incoherent (massive ad buy --> media malpractice) I almost didn't bother w the article. Article was a little better but will pass on anon sources
